title: You've been signed out Our yordles got bored waiting for you. Please sign in to get their attention
body:
Cant play, as the in game leads me to update riot account, to this address - "https://update-account.riotgames.com"

I can log in here, in client, and support site. But when I follow the in--client lead I get this message when trying to update account

This is why I changed my ign and email a few days to a week ago, because the email I got, telling me about this, 

EDIT- SIGNED IN WITH EDGE, SOLVED PROBLEM.

replies.body: What have u meant by SIGNED IN WITH EDGE? Becouse i have the same problem and cant solve it, feeling hopless now
i have the same problem! what do you mean logg in with edge? i keep getting singed out and cant play the game
Try a different browser. Different ones seem to be working for diff people. Firefox seems to work for most, but only Edge or IE work for others.
